Translations.Text: mem te lokone akaso ane dharatina sarjana vakhate hajara nahata rakhya ane na to temana potana sarjana vakhate ane hum pathabhrasta karavavala'one potano madadagara banavanara nathi
ane je divase te kahese ke tamara vicara pramane je mara bhagidaro hata temane pokaro, te'o pokarase, parantu temana manthi ko'i javaba nahim ape, ame temani vacce nasta kari denaro samana utarisum
ane papi'o jahannamane jo'ine samaji lese ke temane temam ja nankhavamam avase, parantu tenathi bacava mate ko'i jagya nahim male
ame a kura'anamam dareka rite sampurna udaharano, loko mate janavya che, parantu manavi sauthi vadhare jhaghado karanara che

loko pase satya margadarsana avi gaya pachi temane imana lavava ane potana palanahara same maphi mangavamam phakata te ja vastu'e rokya ke agalana loko sathe jevum thayum tevum amari sathe thaya, athava temani samaksa khullo prakopa avi jaya

Ame potana payagambarone phakta etala mate ja avatarita kari'e chi'e ke te khusakhabara api de ane saceta kari de. Inkara karanara'o asatyana adhare jhaghade che ane (icche che ke) tenathi satyane haravi de. Te loko'e mari ayatone ane je vastu vade daravavamam ave tene majaka banavi lidhi

tena karata vadhare atyacari bijo kona che, jene tena palanaharani ayato dvara sikhamana apavamam ave, to pana modhum pheravi le ane je kami tena hatha vade karela karmone agala mokali rakhya che tene te bhuli jaya, ni:Sanka ame temana hrdayo para parada nakhi didha che ke te tene (na) samaje ane temana kanamam ada che, bhalene tame te lokone satya marga tarapha bolavata raho, parantu te'o kyareya satya marga nahim pame

tamaro palanahara ghano ja mapha karanara ane krpa karanara che, te jo temana karmona badalamam pakada kare to kharekhara te loko para jhadapathi ja yatana avi pahonce, parantu temana mate eka vacanano samaya nakki che, jenathi te'o bacava mateni ko'i jagya nahim pame
a che te vasti'o, jemane ame temana atyacarana karane nasta kari didha ane ame temane nasta karavano eka samaya nakki kari rakhyo hato
jyare ke musa a.Sa.E potana navayuvanane kahyum ke hum to calato ja rahisa tyam sudhi ke be dariyana melapa para pahoncum, bhalene mane varsona varsa sudhi calavum pade
jyare te banne dariyana melapani jagya'e pahoncya, tyam potani machali bhuli gaya, jene dariyamam suranga jevo potano marga banavi didho
jyare te banne tyanthi agala vadhyam to musa (a.Sa.)E potana navayuvanane kahyum ke lavo, apanum bhojana apo, mane to apani a musapharithi sakhata takalipha bhogavavi padi

Tene javaba apyo ke sum tame joyum? Jyare apane paththarana teke arama kari rahya hata, tyam ja hum machali bhuli gayo hato, kharekhara setane ja mane bhulavi didhum ke hum tamari samaksa teni vata karum, te machali'e alaga rite dariyamam potano rasto banavyo
musa (a.Sa.)E kahyum a ja hatum, jeni sodhamam apane hata, to tyanthi ja potana pagalana nisana sodhata pacha pharya
basa! Amara banda'o manthi eka bandane malya, jene ame potani paseni khasa krpa api hati ane tene potani pasethi khasa jnana sikhavadyum hatum
tene musa (a.Sa.)E kahyum ke hum tamarum anusarana karum? Ke tame mane te jnana sikhavadi do je tamane sikhavadavamam avyum che
temane kahyum ke tame mari sathe kyareya dhiraja nahim rakhi sako
ane je vastune tame potana jnanathi vicari lidhum hoya tena para dhiraja kevi rite rakhi sako cho
musa (a.Sa.)E javaba apyo ke in sa'a allaha tame mane dhiraja rakhanaro pamaso. Ane ko'i vatamam hum tamari avajna nahim karum
tene kahyum ke sarum, jo tame mari sathe avava mate agraha karo cho to yada rakhajo, ko'i vastu babate mane kami pana na puchaso. Tyam sudhi ke hum pote te babate ko'i vata na karum

pachi te banne calya, tyam sudhi ke eka hodimam savara thaya, to tene hodina lakadani baju'o todi nakhi, musa (a.Sa.)E kahyum ke sum tame tene todi rahya cho, jethi hodivala'one dubadi do, a to tame khuba ja moti vata kari didhi
tene javaba apyo ke mem to pahela ja tamane kahi didhum hatum ke tame mari sathe kyareya dhiraja nahim rakhi sako
musa (a.Sa.)E javaba apyo ke mari bhula para mari pakada na karaso ane mari sathe sakhati na karaso

Pachi banne calya, tyam sudhi ke eka balakane joyo, tene tene mari nankhyo, musa (a.Sa.)E kahyum ke sum tame eka pavitra pranane vagara karane mari nankhyo? Ni:Sanka tame to khuba ja kharaba krtya karyum
